snippet: RANDALL--Stephanie (Penny), a resident of Rye Brook, passed away on March 2, 2016. She is survived by her husband, Marty, and her children, Leigh (Anne), David (Beth), Edin, and Jackie, sister Susan Darley, and six grandsons, Charlie, Luke, Jack, Nathan, Benji, and Max. Funeral service this Sunday, 1pm at Larchmont Temple. 1/3
lead_paragraph: RANDALL--Stephanie (Penny), a resident of Rye Brook, passed away on March 2, 2016. She is survived by her husband, Marty, and her children, Leigh (Anne), David (Beth), Edin, and Jackie, sister Susan Darley, and six grandsons, Charlie, Luke, Jack, Nathan, Benji, and Max. Funeral service this Sunday, 1pm at Larchmont Temple. 1/3
